name: THE ONE MILLION SOAP
description:
Clicker game!... can be addictive so the main purpose is to earn one million then final credits are displayed.

Still you can play to earn 1 billion, 1 trillion and so on to infinite so the game becomes eventually more harder to prevent adiction.
I know it's a simple game but clickers may be addictive. Just have fun for a time, hope enjoy!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

* Click on the soap cauldron to make soap.The gauntlet icon indicates how many soaps-per-click 
   are created.
* Click on the market icon to sell soap at current price to earn money. Watch the price before sell.
* Click on the update cauldron icon to gain more soap-per-click.
* Click on the update warehouse to buy a bigger warehouse.
* Click on the workers icon to hire workers. Workers make soap-per-second.
    The clock icon indicates how many,
* Click on the pay workers to make them happy. Unhappier workers makes less soap.
* EARN ONE MILLION!!! AND THANKS OR PLAYING-

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
